problems.title: Check Profit or Loss
problems.description:
Given the cost price (CP) and selling price (SP) of an item, determine if there is a profit, loss, or no profit no loss.
- If SP > CP: Print "Profit"
- If SP < CP: Print "Loss"
- If SP == CP: Print "No Profit No Loss"

Input Format:
Two integers separated by space representing cost price and selling price.

Output Format:
Print "Profit", "Loss", or "No Profit No Loss".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
100 120

Sample Output
Profit

Sample Input
100 80

Sample Output
Loss

Sample Input
100 100

Sample Output
No Profit No Loss

Explanation:
Compare selling price with cost price using if-else conditions.
hintsList: Compare SP with CP: if SP > CP then Profit, else if SP < CP then Loss, else No Profit No Loss.
